text: Adam Maxwell Burton (born January 21, 1974) is an American animator, screenwriter, storyboard artist and voice actor. He is best known for creating the Cartoon Network series Grim & Evil and its spin-offs The Grim Adventures of Billy & Mandy and Evil Con Carne. ==Other websites== * * Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Pennsylvania Category:American animators Category:Screenwriters from Pennsylvania Category:American voice actors
title: Maxwell Atoms
